Caribbean Crisis NYC

A one-month jornada of independent discussions & workshops about Puerto Rico and the Caribbean as the region faces odious debt, unnatural disasters, and forced migration.

Home About

Calendar of independent events maintained by Columbia University Libraries working with Prof. Frances Negrón.

About

This calendar emerged from conversations among a range of Caribbean scholars, librarians, and activists in the New York and New Jersey areas. It is also linked to several projects, including the Unpayable Working Group at Columbia University. If you would like to contribute an event please write to Frances Negrón and Alex Gil.
